subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Cavaliers’ LeBron James, who is coming to New Jersey to face the Nets and, a week later, will visit New York and the Knicks, will have many suitors when he headlines the free-agent class of 2010.
snippet: The Cavaliers’ LeBron James, who is coming to New Jersey to face the Nets and, a week later, will visit New York and the Knicks, will have many suitors when he headlines the free-agent class of 2010.
